short_notes:
Hi everyone! This update marks the final and complete transition of Grok AI Chat and Nano to the new Responses API which Agentic Tools! You can now use each of the three tools individually per chat, and also control reasoning depth! The one downside to this is that this shortcut no longer supports models older than Grok 4, so I have already released a brand new shortcut that is made specifically for those models! The link is https://routinehub.co/shortcut/24743/
I hope you guys enjoy!
